official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment for dental services under part B of the medicare program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under Medicare part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of dentures and dental services.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment for dental services under part B of the medicare program.
